author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #40046

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_5_X`.

This version of the `HIon` HLT menu corresponds to "HLT HIon V1.0" for the 2022 HIon (test) run.

All development menus (e.g. `GRun`) and frozen menus are migrated to the latest `ConfDB` template for the `12_5_X` release cycle. In particular, the frozen HLT menu ("HLT V1.4") of this release cycle is updated to run in `12_5_X` without extra customisations (this is purely a technical change, no physics changes expected).

This PR includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2532](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2532): [HIon] updated `HIDQMEventDisplay` stream (added HIMinBias trigger with smartPS of 2000)
  - [CMSHLT-2536](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2536): [HIon] switched to `rawDataRepacker` in EventContent of `HIDQMEventDisplay`
  - [CMSHLT-2541](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2541): [EXO] set PS=0 for `HLT_HT200_L1SingleLLPJet_DisplacedDijet30_Inclusive1PtrkShortSig5_v`
  - [CMSHLT-2542](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2542): [TSG] set PS=1 for `HLT_EphemeralZeroBias_v`
  - [CMSHLT-2546](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2546): [BPH] set PS=20 for `HLT_DoubleMu4_3_Jpsi_v`
  - [CMSHLT-2547](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2547): [TSG,TRK] increased PSs of `HLT_HT300_Beamspot_v` trigger
  - [CMSHLT-2548](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2548): [EXO,MUO] set PS=1 for `HLT_Mu50_L1SingleMuShower_v` trigger
  - [CMSHLT-2550](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2550): [TSG] changed default PS column to `"2p0E34"`
  - [CMSHLT-2553](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2553): [BPH] added dielectron-parking triggers with `trkHits10` cut
  - [CMSHLT-2556](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2556): [HIon] added `HLT_HIRandom_v` to `HITestRaw` and `HITestRawPrime` PDs
  - [CMSHLT-2559](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2559): [TRK] updated EventContent of `HIDQMOnlineBeamspot` stream
  - [CMSHLT-2560](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2560): [HIon] added FED 1022 to `rawPrimeDataRepacker`
  - [CMSHLT-2563](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2563): [HIon] fixed offset of HIMinBias prescaler and smartPS of `HIZeroBias` in `HIExpressPhysics` PD
  - [CMSHLT-2565](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2565): [LUM,HIon] added AlCaPCC triggers and streams to `HIon` menu (combined table unchanged)
  - [CMSHLT-2566](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2566): [HIon] added HIUPC triggers to `HITestRawPrime` PD

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#40046

Development of HLT menus for 2022 data-taking.
title: HLT menu development for `12_5_X` (1/N): HLT HIon V1.0 of 2022
